Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Oh, please pardon me for eating in front of a
guest. Hmm, who else can I find for you to talk
to...?

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
It's exhausting work keeping this house spic and
span. I snack whenever I can to keep my energy
up.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Our lady has retired for the evening. Please see
yourself out, and we'll look forward to your next
visit.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Our lady's table manners are impeccable. I'm
proud to have been her teacher in that regard.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Our lady can be a bit selfish at times, but it's
only because... Well, never mind that.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
I'll follow our lady's orders to the letter. That's
my duty.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
Some of the other maids are afraid of our lady...
<PAGE>
But an employee should never be afraid of her
employer.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
The other day, our lady thanked me.
<PAGE>
...To be honest, in all the years I've been here,
that was the first time she's done so.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
If our lady seemed selfish before, it's only
because she was lonely.
<PAGE>
But she has so many friends now, and it shows
in her smile. I'm so happy for her.

<NAME_MOB_MALENA>
I've served our lady's family for a long time.
<PAGE>
So I always knew she had a warm heart deep
inside.
